article: On arriving at the local shopping center, I noticed a small sign taped to the first pole. Why would someone place that sign so _ ? www.k@s@5@u.com   #### I looked closer. "Ah, a house for sale. A good way to grab your _ ," I said to myself. "I don't think so," a clerk was standing by me. "That little _ and her mom are doing it." With _ , I approached them. " Excuse me. Why are you _ the house for sale signs so close the ground?" I asked. The woman smiled, "We're not selling the _ . Look closer." I stooped down _ I could finally read the small print. "We miss you!" I read out aloud. I looked up and said, "I don't _ it! You miss the house?" " _ to the left." said the woman. Oh, I hadn't noticed that there was a picture of a dog on it! I said, "Do you _ the dog?" "Yes! Look at the bottom of the sign." www.k@s@5@u.com   #### "I miss you! Come home!" I didn't understand. I must have had that _ look on my face. "My daughter's dog got _ ," the woman explained. "But most people would _ a lost sign where people could _ see it," I said. "I told my daughter that it may be _ to find her dog, as you can see the store has so many signs posted. So she said that she had a better _ . She wanted her dog to _ her," she said. "And hanging them _ there..." "So the dog could see it," she said. "What a great idea!" I said to her. I _ the woman one of my business cards. I had to know this _ . www.k@s@5@u.com   #### One week later my phone rang. The little girl told me her dog came home. Amazing!
